title: Kid School
description: A responsive informational site for children’s activities and resources, built with HTML and Tailwind CSS. Focus is on a playful, accessible layout that highlights programs and resources.
features: Responsive design for phones, tablets, and desktops
Smooth hover effects and lightweight animations
challenges: Achieving a playful, accessible design that scales across devices without using JavaScript frameworks.
futurePlans: Add interactive elements (sliders, collapsible FAQ) and minor JS improvements for richer UX.

title: Bangladesh 2.0
description: A static landing page built with semantic HTML and basic CSS, designed to highlight Bangladesh’s culture, innovation, and development vision. It focuses on layout structure and clean visual presentation.
features: Static single-page layout using HTML and CSS
challenges: Maintaining visual consistency and layout balance without using any responsive techniques or frameworks.
futurePlans: Refactor the layout to be fully responsive using Tailwind CSS or CSS Grid for better mobile compatibility.

title: Browse4Pets
description: A responsive pet adoption website built entirely with HTML and Tailwind CSS. It showcases various pet profiles in a visually appealing layout with smooth styling and animations.
features: Built purely with HTML and Tailwind CSS
Fully responsive design for all screen sizes
Clean and minimal pet showcase layout
Optimized for fast loading and accessibility
challenges: Achieving responsive and visually appealing design without using JavaScript or any frameworks.
futurePlans: Add interactive filters and dynamic content loading using JavaScript in future updates.
